name: Bundesverband Berufsschäfer e. V.
membership: European Forum for Nature Conservation and Pastoralism (EFNCP)
goal: The German Professional Shepherds Organization represents the interests of professional sheep farmers from Germany on the National and European level. The majority of our members are engaged in extensive, high-nature value livestock systems. We are aiming to secure the future of pastoral farming but also to preserve our nature.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Consumers, Culture, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, Regional Policy, Trade
euInitiatives: Any dossier related to the Common Agricultural Policy as well as Animal Health, the Environment and related policy areas.
